I am a priest of the great pantheon.
Well, as a priest I can tell you everything about {blessings}. I can also carry out a {marriage ceremony} to bind your and your beloved's soul together.

There are five blessings available in five sacred places: the spiritual shielding, the spark of the phoenix, the embrace of Tibia, the fire of the suns and the wisdom of solitude. Additionally, you can receive the twist of fate here.
Meditate on that and pray for your soul.
King Tibianus is our benevolent sovereign.
Life is a gift of the gods, honor life and don't destroy it.
It is my mission to spread knowledge about the gods.
My name is Lynda. And the spirits tell me that you are |PLAYERNAME|.
